name: Sunshine #4
description: Sunshine #4 is an award-winning hybrid bred by Bodhi Seeds. This blend of Chemdawg 4 and Sunshine Daydream genetics took the prize for Best Hybrid Flower at the 2015 High Times Medical Cup in Michigan.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Relaxed, Talkative, Euphoric, Depression, Stress, Pain, Headaches, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes
